What is SponzorMe?

SponzorMe is a Marketplace and Event Management System where companies can Save Time and Energy reaching and organizing Events.

  • Lorem
  • Ipsum
  • Dolor

Sponsors

Companies that use sponsorships campaigns, can find events quicker based on their needs, target audiences, country, date, organizers.

Organizers

Organizers can add sponsorship packages, describing their needs and the perks offered. Reaching sponsors anywhere in the world.

Companies

Companies can create their event website page and branded mobile app. Managing everything easily.

Launch Quickly

Create an event is hard work. let us help you with your events in the planning stage.
